CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 28, 1960, pg. 15, reads: "'For You' - Mrs. Homer S. Brown, second from left, smiles through happy tears as Mrs. Ruby Hord presents to her the Sojourner Truth Award for outstanding community service from the Business and Professional Women of Pittsburgh. Held in Hilton Hotel, the Founders Day breakfast brought out nearly 500 guests to hear Atty. Cora Brown speak and to witness the presentation of the award to Mrs. Brown.  Only male in the photo is Atty. Byrd Brown, Cora Brown, center; Mrs. Lenore Rainey, president; Mrs. Hord and Mrs. Katie Everett Johnson, chairman of the breakfast. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Wilhelmina Byrd Brown receiving award plaque from Ruby Hord, with, from left: Byrd Brown, Cora Brown, Lenore Rainey, and Katie Everett Johnson looking on, standing in Hilton Hotel
